item.description:
**Please note that this is a CADC event - all inquiries about this event should be directed to the CADC directly - shannon@cadc.org**

Date: April 30, 2009
Time: 6:30pm
Location: Outthink
Suite 110 Witch Hazel Works
8 Railroad Avenue | Essex, CT 06426
Admission:
online
$20 Members
$25 Future Members
$10 Students
at door
$25 Members
$30 Future Members
$10 Students

**Please buy purchase your ticket online or reserve your spot and pay at the door by RSVPing via email to the CADC organizer - shannon@cadc.org**

CADC hails the return of its popular “Inspire Me” events with a talk from John Visgilio, Principal of Outthink. Come hear John and other Outthink professionals talk about career paths, opportunities, detours and dead ends.

John promises to give a peek into one person’s experience starting as a designer and ending up as a business owner and manager of almost 50 creative professionals.
item.name: CADC - Inspire Me: John Visgilio of Outthink
